About Us

Started connecting dots in the beginning of  2022. As an IT Consulting Farm we started gaining our customer trust by providing them the best solution they can get. We are proud of our experienced workforce. The Company started with the vision of two dreamer. We started in a small basement of a Canadian House with the tech brains from both Canada and Bangladesh. We have a simple motto to help our clients to grow so that we can shine. We are happy to help you too.
